text:
two years later and it has gotten two lames

chubbying

name: horace_lung
text: This strip really introduced the idea that there was a whole Achewood world outside the house where they live.  And for that I give it 5 Beefs.

name: berami
text:
I am chubbying this for the referring to rating scale as "Beefs".

Also, Teodor rocks thouse Shakspearian bloomers.

name: gournal
text: Haha, thouse...

name: epicurus
text: Asparagus racing is a tangled web of fast rides, women, men, money, drugs, and danger. And asparagus.

name: spectre
text: The men involved live on nothing but adreniline. booze and Hollandaise.

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: Enter the Asparagus Slalom

name: honesttom
text: Half the humour of Achewood is the stuff you don't hear. I feel like this strip is part of an incredible untold story about Todd.

name: zapatos
text: I feel like he got mad at T, drank some more, and crashed into a wall.

name: jonnay
text: Downtown Danny is the bastard of the asparagus racing world.

name: heccibiggs
text: The way that it looks like Teodor and Mr Bear have tiny lower bodies really tickled me.

name: snowman
text: I was gonna say that too!  It looks like they are standing in a glass of water, lower halves all distorted...

name: dovey
text: Perrrrspectiiiiiiiive

text: Comment avatar synergy chubby

name: snowman
text: Onstad is not on a roll with me here.

name: em2
text: If this van is rockin'...

name: mulisha7
text: This strip is way underrated. I love Teodor's frustration at Todd's poor Asparagus slalom skills. You get the idea they have been at this for a while and Todd is not improving.

name: a_knobbie
text: Ah, the original purpose of asparagus. I always wondered

name: relaxing
text: It's not just for makin' your pee stink!

name: aaron_haynes
text: 7 years later, I'm still holding out for the debut appearance of Downtown Danny.
